Text:
Cause I know you want to know:

Unfortunately we had to repeat an episode in Melbourne on TV, so that threw our delivery schedule out one week. We're about to upload a special edition ep in the next few days, then 32 as per our normal delivery schedule. Glad to see our international fans so passionate about our show.

-Jason
BTW Jason is the guy on the show with a beard who you can tell cares about gaming the way Victor Lucas used to.
